name: dns
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool domain_checker.
Tool description: The Domain Checker API allows users to quickly and easily check the validity, availability, expiration, and DNS settings of a given domain name. With features such as keyword search and validation, it's an efficient tool for developers, businesses, and individuals looking to manage or purchase domain names.
API description: Fetches DNS records for a given domain using the RapidAPI domain checker service.

domain.description: The domain for which DNS records are to be retrieved.
